name: Fetch Marketing Preferences with valid Data (no contact info)

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930020283000"

When I fetch the Customer Marketing Preferences for CIF Key <cifKey>:
| cifKey |
| 0100000930020283000 |

Then the following Marking Information data should be returned
| preferredContactDay | preferredContactDayUpdateDate | preferredContactTime | preferredContactTimeUpdateDate | mailMarketingPreferences | mailMarketingPreferencesUpdateDate | phoneMarketingPreferences | phoneMarketingPreferencesUpdateDate | emailMarketingPreferences | emailMarketingPreferencesUpdateDate | preferredContactMethod | mailMarketingPreferencesConfirmDate | phoneMarketingPreferencesConfirmDate | emailMarketingPreferencesConfirmDate | mailMarketingPreferencesConfirmBy | phoneMarketingPreferencesConfirmBy | emailMarketingPreferencesConfirmBy | mailMarketingPreferencesUpdateBy | phoneMarketingPreferencesUpdateBy | emailMarketingPreferencesUpdateBy |
|  |  |  |  | OPT IN | 2005-06-08 | OPT IN | 2005-06-08 | OPT IN | 2005-06-08 |  | 2015-11-19 | 2015-11-19 | 2015-11-19 | 66515 | 66515 | 66515 | 15751 | 15751 | 15751 |

children.description: Validate response: | preferredContactDay | preferredContactDayUpdateDate | preferredContactTime | preferredContactTimeUpdateDate | mailMarketingPreferences | mailMarketingPreferencesUpdateDate | phoneMarketingPreferences | phoneMarketingPreferencesUpdateDate | emailMarketingPreferences | emailMarketingPreferencesUpdateDate | preferredContactMethod | mailMarketingPreferencesConfirmDate | phoneMarketingPreferencesConfirmDate | emailMarketingPreferencesConfirmDate | mailMarketingPreferencesConfirmBy | phoneMarketingPreferencesConfirmBy | emailMarketingPreferencesConfirmBy | mailMarketingPreferencesUpdateBy | phoneMarketingPreferencesUpdateBy | emailMarketingPreferencesUpdateBy | | | | | | OPT IN | 2005-06-08 | OPT IN | 2005-06-08 | OPT IN | 2005-06-08 | | 2015-11-19 | 2015-11-19 | 2015-11-19 | 66515 | 66515 | 66515 | 15751 | 15751 | 15751 |
